an4.132:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.132:4.3: 1. One who speaks on topic, but not fluently.
an4.132:4.4: • One who speaks fluently, but not on topic.
an4.132:4.5: • One who speaks on topic and fluently.
an4.132:4.6: • One who speaks neither on topic nor fluently.
an4.132:4.7: These are the four people found in the world.”
